Events.Text: Hello, I'd like directions to the airport from Forbes and Murray
Could I have your mode of travel and  departure time please?
Could I have your mode of travel and departure time please?
I'll go by transit, leaving at 9am
Thank you. One moment please.
Thank you. One moment please.
Thanks

DetailedTransitInstructions: Walk east from your starting location towards the bus stop at Forbes and Murray. You will walk 3 blocks and the stop will be in front of a large brown church.
Take the 61A until the final stop, which will be at Forbes and Craig. It will take approximately 20 minutes and 13 stops.
After you get off the stop, turn right at the Starbucks and walk down Craig St for 2 blocks.
After you pass the Chinese Restaurant (green brick building), your destination will be on the left just before the crosswalk.
TransitInstructions: Walk to the bus stop at Forbes and Murray.
Take the 61A until the last stop.
After you get off the stop, turn left and walk down Craig St for 2 blocks.
Your destination will be on the left.

Scenario.UserTask: You want directions from 'Airport' to 'Forbes and Murray' at 9 am by Transit. When the wizard gives the 1st and 4th step, indicate that you do not understand until you are given more detail. Keep going until you've reached your destination.
Scenario.WizardTask: Tell the user the directions from their departure location to their arrival location

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the AI Assistant give you suitable directions?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
